channel.title: Modeling question, blender, not sure where to post this question
channel.description:
well i hope i'm posting in the right area, anyways, here'smy question.
i never really opened and edited a ruenscape/jagex model, so now, i tried looking in my friends old p server files, and i found some folder with "models" and they were all in winrar. i didnt everything, including extracting them, but i couldn't open up the files in blender
my question is: where do i find the jagex models so that i can edit/re-color them?
please, i would rep++ you if i could ;] (i mean to the one who answers) but i can't xD
